author: James Powel, Bailey Schulz
title: 'Everything on sale': American Freight closing all stores amid parent company's bankruptcy - USA TODAY
description: Furniture store American Freight will close its 328 stores as parent company Franchise Group Inc. goes bankrupt. See the locations
content:
• The closures are part of Chapter 11 bankruptcy proceedings by parent company Franchise Group Inc.

author: Addy Bink
title: Your paycheck may be larger in 2025, even if you don’t get a raise - WJW FOX 8 News Cleveland
description: While there’s plenty of time left in November, you may already have something exciting to look forward to in 2025: a slightly larger paycheck, even without a raise.
content:
